snippet: DURHAN--Julia M.,beloved wife of George Durhan passed away on April 11, 2016 at Talbot Hospice in Easton, MD. Born on December 9, 1945 in the Bronx, NY, she was the daughter of Angelo and Mary Jenzano, she married her husband George on August 18, 1968 and seven years ago moved from South Salem, NY to Easton, MD. Julie is survived by her husband George, her brother Tom, his wife Patricia Biermayr Jenzano and nephew Brandon Jenzano of Sterling, VA. In lieu of flowers, the family suggests contributions in her memory to the American Cancer Society and/or Talbot Hospice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DURHAN, JULIA M.
